Class WebYear

java.lang.Object
  util.WebYear

public class WebYear
extends java.lang.Object

Class used to store information of events in a year and get corresponding web representation

addEvent

public void addEvent(java.lang.String doing,
                     int day,
                     int month,
                     int fromH,
                     int fromM,
                     int toH,
                     int toM,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> participants,
                     java.lang.String location,
                     int endingDay,
                     int endingMonth,
                     int repeatingIntervall)
Add an Event to the WebYear

Parameters:
doing - Event subject
day - Event day
month - Event month
fromH - beginning time of the Event (hours)
fromM - beginning time of the Event (minutes)
toH - ending time of the Event (hours)
toM - ending time of the Event (minutes)
participants - list of participants
location - location of the Event
endingDay - ending day
endingMonth - ending month
repeatingIntervall - repeating interval (0 if not set)
